block.p: VENDETTI-Ralph. On September 12, 2000 of Manhattan Beach, California. Formerly of Westfield and Newark, NJ. Husband of Marti (Nee Galindo). Father of Christian Silva, Nicole and Alexa Vendetti. Son of Carmen and Josephine (Fi Fi) (Nee Fallone) Vendetti. Brother of Lori Ann Vendetti and the late Carmine Vendetti. Visitation at the Galante Funeral Home, 2800 Morris Ave., Union, NJ on Friday from 2-4 & 7-9 PM. Funeral Mass at St. James Church, Springfield, NJ on Saturday at 9:15 AM. In lieu of flowers donations to the charity of your choice.
